tasks.name: Setup Project Structure
tasks.description: Create the project directory structure for frontend (React) and backend (FastAPI). Prepare the environment for further development.

tasks.name: Set up FastAPI Backend
tasks.description: Create the core structure for the FastAPI backend, including the entry point file.

tasks.name: Write FastAPI Health Check Endpoint
tasks.description: Create a health check API endpoint that returns a simple status message, verifying the backend setup.

tasks.name: Create React Frontend Application
tasks.description: Generate the React frontend application using Create React App.

tasks.name: Design Home Page UI
tasks.description: Design the homepage UI, including logo, navigation, welcome message, and 'Start Chat' button.

tasks.name: Design Chatbot Page Layout
tasks.description: Develop the layout for the chatbot page, including input fields, response area, and action buttons.

tasks.name: Implement Chatbot API Integration
tasks.description: Integrate the frontend with the backend to enable real-time messaging in the chatbot.

tasks.name: Add User Authentication
tasks.description: Implement optional user login/registration using email or social media accounts.

tasks.name: Implement Voice Interaction
tasks.description: Add voice-to-text and text-to-speech functionality for the chatbot.

tasks.name: Add Rating System
tasks.description: Create a rating system for users to provide feedback after each chatbot session.

tasks.name: Test Application and Fix Bugs
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing and resolve any issues or bugs.

tasks.name: Deploy Application
tasks.description: Deploy the application to a production environment, ensuring it is live and accessible.

tasks.name: Set up Navigation Bar
tasks.description: Implement the navigation bar with menu items for different historical personalities.

tasks.description: Integrate the Mahatma Gandhi AI model into the chatbot application.

tasks.name: Implement Abrahm Lincoln Chatbot
tasks.description: Integrate the Abrahm Lincoln AI model into the chatbot application.

tasks.name: Style Application with Vintage Theme
tasks.description: Apply the vintage theme to the application, including color scheme, font family, and UI component styles.
